short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save links for blog post research

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you save page links into categories (a category can be a blog post title or topic you are gathering research for) and export them into a txt or doc file.
